altTitles.vi: Con Gái Duy Nhất Của Hoàng Đế

description.en:
Ariadna Lereg Ilestri Pre Agrigent…

And so my life begins with this ridiculously long name, born to royalty and the center of attention — all because of one dangerous man; the veritably insane tyrant king, ruthless conqueror of ten empires, nightmare of all continents… and my father?! Will I be able to survive with this maniac?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%99%A9%EC%A0%9C%EC%9D%98-%EC%99%B8%EB%8F%99%EB%94%B8/2303), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home/47686939)

**Official Translations:**
* English: [COPIN](https://copincomics.com/toon/520), [Pocket Comics](https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/241), [Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/daughter-of-the-emperor/info), [Tappytoon](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/daughterofemp)
* Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语: [AC.QQ](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/551196), [PODO](https://www.podoteng.com/)
* [Hindi / हिन्दी](https://krosskomics.com/series/954316) (Expired)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Daughter-of-the-Emperor/141)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/855?etype=episode)
* [Vietnamese / Tiếng Việt](https://comi.mobi/truyen/con-gai-duy-nhat-cua-hoang-de/)

**Hard Copies:** [Korean / 한국어](http://www.yes24.com/Product/Goods/59320978), [Japanese / 日本語](https://www.kadokawa.co.jp/product/321710000284/)
description.zh-hk:
在异世重生后，我成为了奥格利帝国的唯一皇女。然而从出生的那一刻起，我就被充满了同情的视线包围着。理由只有一个——我爸是个疯子。通过叛乱登上皇位的反王，让整个大陆陷入恐慌的稀世暴君。有一个杀妻杀子都是小菜一碟的爸爸……我真的能活下来吗？【每周三、五更新】
